entries: You've managed to eke out an existence in the storm-wracked Sodden Lands and have become an expert at scavenging food and tools.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Survival} skill and the {@skill Lore||Swamp Lore} skill.
You gain the {@feat Forager} skill feat.
